name: vouchervault
description: VoucherVault is a self-hosted manager for discount codes, gift cards, and vouchers. It tracks balances, expiry dates, and usage, helping keep personal or family vouchers organized.

features.title: Voucher Tracking
features.description: Store and organize discount codes, gift cards, and vouchers in one place

features.title: Balance Management
features.description: Track remaining balances on gift cards and vouchers

features.title: Expiry Tracking
features.description: Monitor expiration dates and receive alerts before vouchers expire

features.title: Usage History
features.description: Record when and where vouchers were used for reference

features.title: Category Organization
features.description: Group vouchers by store, type, or custom categories

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific vouchers quickly using search and filters

features.title: Barcode Storage
features.description: Store barcode images for easy scanning at checkout

features.title: Notes
features.description: Add notes to vouchers for additional information or restrictions
